snippet: Kevin Lau Chun-to sustained severe cuts in the attack, which heightened concerns about threats to press freedom in the semiautonomous Chinese territory.
abstract: Hong Kong court convicts two men in 2014 cleaver attack on journalist Kevin Lau Chun-to.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Lau Chun-to sustained severe cuts in the attack, which heightened concerns about threats to press freedom in the semiautonomous Chinese territory.

headline.main: Hong Kong Convicts 2 in 2014 Cleaver Attack on Journalist
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Hong Kong: 2 Are Convicted of Attacking a Journalist
